arts.ttl: Torino looking to bounce back against Fiorentina
arts.sum: Torino will want to forget their heavy defeat to Inter, and will hunt down their first win of the season against Fiorentina. Pioli made his Serie A debut as a coach against Torino, on Parma`s bench: 1-1 at Olimpico Grande Torino in September 10, 2006.

arts.ttl: Pioli reacts to Fiorentina Conference League draw and Torino test
arts.sum: Fiorentina discovered their opponents in the league phase of this seasonâ€™s UEFA Conference League yesterday...
